summary: An email from an unidentified sender to USANYS and others seeking clarification about two batches of documents in the US v. Epstein Relativity database, specifically regarding Batch 003 (USAO-SDFL) and Batch 004 (OPR Materials).
keyFacts: The email references a US v. Epstein Relativity database containing document batches.
Batch 003 is associated with USAO-SDFL (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida).
Batch 004 is labeled as OPR Materials, referencing emails received from OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility).
The communication indicates an ongoing process of document review and clarification regarding the Epstein case materials.
